article.class: fusion-post-grid post-2377 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-announcement category-news

div.p: 14 April 2020 Dear Heritage Families, Thank you for being part of our Heritage family. These are challenging times and I am glad to work through them with you. Hero families achieve more [...]

article.class: fusion-post-grid post-2363 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-announcement category-news

h2.a: School Closures and Stay at Home

div.p: Dear Heritage Families, A few new developments have come about over the weekend and today that are important to share with you. This morning, Governor Ducey and Superintendent Hoffman extended school closures through the [...]

article.class: fusion-post-grid post-2359 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-announcement category-news

div.p: Dear Heritage Families, It is a pleasure to announce that our online Citizenship program is ready for you to enjoy in your home environment. A great deal of time and effort has gone into re-creating the Citizenship program [...]
